Rules.InvariantScript:
If(
    ImageSlider.CurrentIndex = Blank(),
    Index(
        ImageSlider.Images,
        1
    ).Image,
    Index(
        ImageSlider.Images,
        ImageSlider.CurrentIndex
    ).Image
)

If(
    ImageSlider.CurrentIndex = Blank(),
    Index(
        ImageSlider.Images,
        1
    ).AltText,
    Index(
        ImageSlider.Images,
        ImageSlider.CurrentIndex
    ).AltText
)

If(If(
    ImageSlider.CurrentIndex = Blank(),
    Index(
        ImageSlider.Images,
        1
    ).ID,
    Index(
        ImageSlider.Images,
        ImageSlider.CurrentIndex
    ).ID
)=ThisItem.ID,15,10)

If(If(
    ImageSlider.CurrentIndex = Blank(),
    Index(
        ImageSlider.Images,
        1
    ).ID,
    Index(
        ImageSlider.Images,
        ImageSlider.CurrentIndex
    ).ID
)=ThisItem.ID,15,10)

If(If(
    ImageSlider.CurrentIndex = Blank(),
    Index(
        ImageSlider.Images,
        1
    ).ID,
    Index(
        ImageSlider.Images,
        ImageSlider.CurrentIndex
    ).ID
)=ThisItem.ID,ImageSlider.ActionButtonColor,RGBA(255, 255, 255, 1))
